body_html:
Hey,
so for me there a to options, which work:

  • Just quit your TensorFlow services and wait for 1 to 2 hours. The files should then appear on HDFS
  • you can use hdfs debug recoverLease on the files, which are not fully written yet (https://hadoop.apache.org/docs/r2.7.1/hadoop-project-dist/hadoop-hdfs/HDFSCommands.html#recoverLease)
body_text:
Hey,
so for me there a to options, which work:

Just quit your TensorFlow services and wait for 1 to 2 hours. The files should then appear on HDFS
you can use hdfs debug recoverLease on the files, which are not fully written yet (https://hadoop.apache.org/docs/r2.7.1/hadoop-project-dist/hadoop-hdfs/HDFSCommands.html#recoverLease)
body:
Hey,
so for me there a to options, which work:
- Just quit your TensorFlow services and wait for 1 to 2 hours. The files should then appear on HDFS
- you can use `hdfs debug recoverLease` on the files, which are not fully written yet (<https://hadoop.apache.org/docs/r2.7.1/hadoop-project-dist/hadoop-hdfs/HDFSCommands.html#recoverLease>)
